import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get an action/automation"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/actions/{action_identifier}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch the details of a self-service action or automation.<br/><br/>To learn more about actions and automations, check out the [documentation](https://docs.port.io/actions-and-automations/).<br/>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","minLength":1},"in":"path","name":"action_identifier","description":"The identifier of the action/automation you want to fetch.<br/>","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Success"},"404":{"422":{"description":"One of the following errors occurred:\n\n<table>\n<tr>\n  <th>Error</th>\n  <th>Description</th>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n  <td><b>invalid_request</b></td>\n  <td>The data provided does not match the route schema</td>\n</tr>\n</table>\n"},"description":"One of the following errors occurred:\n\n<table>\n<tr>\n  <th>Error</th>\n  <th>Description</th>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n  <td><b>not_found</b></td>\n  <td>The action/automation with the provided identifier was not found</td>\n</tr>\n</table>\n"},"500":{"description":"One of the following errors occurred:\n\n<table>\n<tr>\n  <th>Error</th>\n  <th>Description</th>\n</tr>\n<tr>\n  <td><b>internal_error</b></td>\n  <td>An internal error occurred</td>\n</tr>\n</table>\n"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
